com.gazbert.patterns.structural.adapter

Class AccountAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gazbert.patterns.structural.adapter.AbstractAccount
      • com.gazbert.patterns.structural.adapter.AccountAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Account

    public class AccountAdapter
extends AbstractAccount
    Our adapter class.

    AbstractAccount is the class we are adapting to - we extend from this class.

    OffshoreAccount is the class we are adapting from - we wrap this class.

    Author:
    gazbert
